channel.title: Help plx!
channel.description: k where do i change the name of the source (lothy) to my servers name? also do i just use ::giveadmin for me to get admin

item.title: Help plx!
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

go onto characters and change the one with a number 0 to (0-2)
0 - Player
1 - Player Moderator
2 - Administrator.

item.title: Help plx!
item.dc:creator: @PandaScape PandaScape
item.description:
@PandaScape wrote:

idk when i run server the things load. mabye its this part.

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

checkmods();
checkadmins(3);
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins(assault) == 5)
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5)
playerRights = 3;

how do i specify admin?

this is cheezscape btw[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 10:30:09 PM[/size][hr]oopsie yea i didnt edit compiler

@echo off
COLOR 08
title cheezscape
“F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

what i do wit it?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 10:32:19 PM[/size][hr].
